body.raw:
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=UTF-8
In-Reply-To: <84umizq7c4jtrew491brpa6iu-0@mailer.nylas.com>
References: <84umizq7c4jtrew491brpa6iu-0@mailer.nylas.com>
Subject: Meeting on Thursday
From: Bill <wbrogers@mit.edu>
To: Ben Bitdiddle <ben.bitdiddle@gmail.com>

Hey Ben,

Would you like to grab coffee @ 2pm this Thursday?"
Bill

functionality: Get a list of all messages scheduled to be sent.
Delete a scheduled message. Use the job_status_id returned from [/outbox](https://docs.nylas.com/reference#post-outbox)
Send a message or schedule messages to be sent.
Update the message scheduled send time. Use the job_status_id returned from [/outbox](https://docs.nylas.com/reference#post-outbox).
Free/Busy allows you to query availability information for a Calendar during a certain time period. Furthermore, the data returned doesn't
Edit properties of secondary calendars that have been created.
Delete any secondary calendars that have been created.
Check multiple calendars to find available time slots for a single meeting.
Check multiple calendars to find available time slots for a single meeting.
Creates an event. Note that notify participants is set to true, so an email will be sent to invitees.

Creates a new webhook for the specified client ID

functionality: Get the job status for a specific job_status_id. States for this can be successful, pending, or failed.
